mapper.insert: insert into feed ( feed_id, feed_title, feed_description, feed_recipe, FEED_COOKTIME, FEED_COOKLEVEL, FEED_TIME,FEED_LIFESTYLE,FEED_INTEREST,FEED_FOOD_FAVOR,FEED_FOOD_TIME,USER_ID ) values (feed_seq.nextval, #{feed_title}, #{feed_description}, #{feed_recipe}, #{feed_cooktime}, #{feed_cooklevel}, sysdate,#{feed_lifestyle},#{feed_interest},#{feed_food_favor},#{feed_food_time},#{user_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT feed_id FROM feed WHERE feed_title = #{feed_title} and feed_description=#{feed_description} and feed_recipe=#{feed_recipe}
